title: Unauthorized immigrant population U.S. 1990 to 2017
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Number of immigrants in millions. In total the number of data points it has is 16.
Overall Number of immigrants in millions has increased over the Year.
Number of immigrants in millions is slightly increasing from 1990 to 2005, and finally roughly constant from 2005 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 1995 and 2000.
The highest Number of immigrants in millions, of value 12.2 was reached at Year 2007
Minimum Number of immigrants in millions about 3.5 was reached at Year 1990
